author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Tile floor tips…I fill all the DITRA cavities with mortar then I apply more with my trowel. After I set the tile, I tap it with a rubber mallet and clean the edges. In toilet alcoves I ensure tiles are equidistant from the wall so that the final look is symmetric. For more tile tips visit homerepairtutor.com 🔥#tile #tilefloor #bathroomreno #homerenovation #homerepairtutor
title: Tile Floor Tips - #shorts #tilefloor #homerepairtutor
